event_name: Prime Timers (Senior Adults): Hymn Sing and Salad Lunch

event.description: Come join us for lunch, fellowship and a time to sing your favorite Hymns. A salad lunch is being planned along with some sweet treats. If you would like to bring ingredients or a complete salad, please Dwight (503-317-4017) or Traci Drapela (503-317-4850). Requests can be made for your favorite hymn as well.
event.name: Prime Timers (Senior Adults): Hymn Sing and Salad Lunch
event.summary:
Come join us for lunch, fellowship and a time to sing your favorite Hymns. 

A salad lunch is being planned along with some sweet treats. 

If you would like to bring ingredients or a complete salad, please Dwight (503-317-4017) or Traci Drapela (503-317-4850). 

Requests can be made for your favorite hymn as well.
